name: lighthouse-lambda
description: Run Google Chrome Lighthouse on AWS Lambda.

scripts.build:install: docker run --rm -v "$PWD":/var/task lambci/lambda:build-nodejs10.x bash -c "rm -rf node_modules && npm install"
scripts.build: docker run --rm -v "$PWD":/var/task lambci/lambda:build-nodejs10.x bash -c "rm -f *.zip && zip lighthouse-lambda.zip -r lib node_modules bin test.js package.json"
